title: BlockPrint | Gimbalabs build a cardano Treasury explorer.
summary: Cardano’s treasury is unclear and fragmented, with no unified simple, data-driven way to see where funds go or how long the treasury can last, inflows, outflows, long-term runway, across categories.
solution: Build a dedicated Cardano Treasury Explorer that consolidates treasury activity into a single platform, for visibility of fund flows, spending trends, project milestones, and treasury sustainability.
proposer_relevant_experience:
**Builders**

blockprint builders filled with long term cardano contributors of mesh and Gimbalabs with experienced developers in charge of UI/UX, frontend and backend integrations, checkout our contributors list here:

- https://blockprint.team/contributors

Collaborating with gimbalabs builders for higer experiences in backend cardano integration

- [https://www\.gimbalabs\.com/](https://www.gimbalabs.com/)

**Governance director**

Responsible for tracking and delivering timely updates on Cardano governance activities proposals, parameter changes, constitutional matters, and ecosystem decisions. Ensures the organization stays informed, aligned, and prepared for governance-related actions.

- Tevo Kask -  [https://linktr\.ee/tevosaks](https://linktr.ee/tevosaks)
    - Role: Coordinates development - Experienced in community building, governance processes, proposal writing, project facilitation, UX/UI design, and documentation management.

sub_fields.title: Category Questions
sub_fields.description: Answer the following questions to determine the eligibility of your proposal.

sub_fields.title: Describe what makes your idea innovative compared to what has been previously launched in the market (whether by you or others).
sub_fields.description: Please provide your rationale.
sub_fields.answer:
- [https://cardanotreasury\.fi/](https://cardanotreasury.fi/)
    - A Financial dashboard by Xerberus specifically tracking annual budgets funds, intersect contracts for tracking balance and payouts.
    - Limited to the overall treasury balance in terms of predictive modeling, comparing of inflows to outflows for impact analysis.
    - Not easy to navigate for educational purposes.
- [https://treasury\.sundae\.fi/instances](https://treasury.sundae.fi/instances) - SundaeLabs built a web-interface specifically for budget administrators, auditors and vendors which is linked to the one above. - limited to overview of cardano treasury flows - Not easy for educational purposes
- [https://tempo\.vote/treasury](https://tempo.vote/treasury) - Focused on voting and governance tools for DReps, DAOs, SPOs. May offer a treasury dashboard for projection, but more governance-vote centric; lacks rich analytics.

sub_fields.title: Describe what your prototype or MVP will demonstrate, and where it can be accessed.
sub_fields.description: Please provide your rationale.
sub_fields.answer:
- The MVP is a web-based Cardano Treasury Explorer that demonstrates core functionality for transparency, accountability, and governance intelligence.
- It showcases real-time treasury inflows and outflows, top beneficiaries, funded projects with milestone tracking, and sustainability projections.
    - Example of the gitHub is an insight we had on how a cardano governance explorer should look like
- Accessible on website and GitHub
    - [https://block\-gov\.vercel\.app/](https://block-gov.vercel.app/)
    - [https://github\.com/BlockPrintio/BlockGov](https://github.com/BlockPrintio/BlockGov)

sub_fields.title: Describe realistic measures of success, ideally with on-chain metrics.
sub_fields.description: Please provide your rationale.
sub_fields.answer:
success will be measured with quantifiable on-chain, usage, infrastructure, and community KPIs.

- On-chain metrics:
    - over 1,500 unique wallet interactions within first six months, over 500 on-chain transactions initiated via the explorer resulting to an estimation of over ₳100,000 in treasury donations first year, 99%+ on-chain event indexing accuracy.
- Usage metrics:
    - User friendly interface will boost 3,000+ Monthly Active Users, 300+ Daily Active Users, 60% user retention, and median API response.
- Transparency metrics:
    - Over 20 community contributors, over 500 feedback responses via mails, and at least 10 governance decisions informed by the platform’s data.
- Infrastructure metrics: 99.5% uptime, <60-second indexing delay, 100% historical coverage, and <0.1% API error rate.

sub_fields.title: Please describe your proposed solution and how it addresses the problem
sub_fields.description: Please describe your proposed solution and how it addresses the problem
sub_fields.answer:
Intersect serves as an Administrator within Cardano’s funding ecosystem, helping to operationalize community-approved proposals by coordinating due diligence, contracting, and on-chain disbursements, Smart contracts will hold treasury funds and vendor payments transparently on-chain, effectively in escrow.

SundaeLabs has developed on-chain onchain designed for treasury management.

This platform on the outflows panel would serve as a visualizer tracking the cardano treasury funds in the following manner of this gotten from intersect docs

- Solution
    - Our solution is a cardano treasury explorer that showcase a dashboard with a social Media (X,Thread) type Interface, of 6 different tabs in the following,
- **Overview** -  
    - This tab showcase the real-time treasury balance in ADA and cardano supported stables(USDA, USDM), treasury loans and all other forms of cardano treasury balance.
    - at the page bottom, It also showcases top treasury beneficiaries useful for transparency, awareness of active builders among others.
- **Proposals**
    - This showcases the number Governance action proposals on treasury withdrawal ongoing, awarded and rejected proposals, available ADA allocated for all proposals if they all gets passed
    - It also showcases treasury withdrawal proposal details and value requested.
- **Outflows** -
    - This showcase all treasury current project withdrawals in chronological order with a status in categories of Approved, processing or paid and value
    - Tracking approved annual budgets and pending withdrawals
    - Shows a graph of withdrawals for each milestones for record of timely delivery
- **Inflows \-**
    - Showcases and tracks treasury incomes either from each epoch or donations and any additional treasury streams, understanding how the treasury grow overtime.
- **Projects** -
    - This tab provides description and details on all ongoing and previously funded treasury projects.
    - Tracking projects status in the following category, publish, initialize, reorganize, fund, disburse, complete, withdraw, pause, resume, modify, cancel, Sweep
    - segmented to milestone progress, budgets, delivery timelines, and verifiable outputs tracking to the smart contract payments.
    - Users can follow or subscribe to specific projects with e-mail to receive updates on deliverables, enabling real-time checks and balances which is limited to intersect scope.
- **Analyser \-**
    - This tab estimates the long-term health of the treasury by projecting future inflows vs. outflows using staking activity, protocol parameters, fees trend, and spending patterns.


- The platform also allows donation directly to the cardano treasury via connect wallet
- Overtime support submitting a governance action directly focus on treasury withdrawal.

sub_fields.title: Please define the positive impact your project will have on the wider Cardano community
sub_fields.description: Please define the positive impact your project will have on the wider Cardano community
sub_fields.answer:
- The explorer improves governance by making treasury activity transparent, easy to understand, and data-driven.
- It reduces information gaps between voters, builders, and reviewers by clearly showing where funds come from, how they are spent, and what value funded projects deliver.
- Real-time analytics, sustainability forecasts, and project accountability tools strengthen decision-making for dReps, SPOs, and community members.
- By enabling better oversight, highlighting top beneficiaries, and making treasury health measurable, the platform boosts trust, participation, and responsible ecosystem growth.

sub_fields.title: What is your capability to deliver your project with high levels of trust and accountability? How do you intend to validate if your approach is feasible?
sub_fields.description: What is your capability to deliver your project with high levels of trust and accountability? How do you intend to validate if your approach is feasible?
sub_fields.answer:
The project is highly feasible due to the availability of open-source projects on Cardano governance data and backend integration of treasury resources via APIs such as Koios, Ogimios, Maestro, db-sync mirrors, and governance metadata feeds.

- leverage the docs by Sundealabs to create our instance of treasury oversight Management [https://github\.com/SundaeSwap\-finance/treasury\-contracts/blob/main/offchain/src/metadata/spec\.md](https://github.com/SundaeSwap-finance/treasury-contracts/blob/main/offchain/src/metadata/spec.md)
- The team’s experience in Cardano tooling, Governance participation, and explorer development ensures technical readiness across backend indexing, frontend visualization, and UX design.
- **BlockPrint**
    - A cardano developers community, with ten (10) contributors of different specialities and stacks and years of experience, fully focused on making blockchain accessible to end users, which got started from the Gimbalabs African developers Education Initiative - 2025,
    - we came across a gap between the cardano treasury participation and it’s transparency to the end users which we believe cardano treasury deserves more awareness and transparency compared to what is happening on polkadot [https://polkadot\.dotreasury\.com/\#/](https://polkadot.dotreasury.com/#/)
- **Gimbalabs**

Gimbalabs contributors have successfully delivered:

- multiple Catalyst-funded infrastructure tools and governance applications
- dRep utilities, dashboards, and Discord governance bots
- learning libraries and long-running developer education cohorts
- production APIs, wallet-enabled portals, and open governance prototypes
- The team’s combination of technical depth and real-world governance experience makes them uniquely positioned as a good partner to deliver a trustworthy, scalable cardano treasury explorer.

sub_fields.title: Please provide a cost breakdown of the proposed work and resources
sub_fields.description: Please provide a cost breakdown of the proposed work and resources
sub_fields.answer:
- **Budget & Costs \(150,000 ADA\)** -
- Budget 1 UI/UX Designers (2) - 10,000 ADA 
    - Rate: 40 ADA/hour 
    - Hours: 2 designers × 125 hours
    - Total: 10,000 ADA
- **Frontend Engineers \(2\)**
    - Rate: 45 ADA/hour
    - Hours: 2 engineers × 220 hours
    - Total: 19,800 ADA
- **Backend Engineers \(5\)**
    - Rate 70 ADA/hour
    - Hours 5 engineers × 230 hours
    - Total: 80,500 ADA
- **Cardano Governance Director** (1)
    - Rate: ~70 ADA/weekly meetings
    - Total: 7,500 ADA
- **Marketing an Awareness**
    - Rate: ~35 ADA/hour
    - Hours: 250 hours
    - Total: 8,750 ADA
- **Infrastructure \(Hosting, APIs, Monitoring\)**
    - Estimated: 12,725 ADA
- **QA and Testing**
    - Estimated: 10,725 ADA

sub_fields.title: How does the cost of the project represent value for the Cardano ecosystem?
sub_fields.description: How does the cost of the project represent value for the Cardano ecosystem?
sub_fields.answer:
- The Cardano Treasury currently holds over 1.6B ADA, making long-term monitoring, health assessment, and strategic oversight critical for sustainable ecosystem growth. This project delivers a comprehensive, data-driven system for tracking treasury performance, enabling smarter allocation of funds, reducing waste, and increasing accountability. By prioritizing open-source development, reusable components, and community-driven contribution, the solution maximizes impact while minimizing ongoing costs. With a funding amount of 150,000 ADA, this represents excellent value for money, protecting Cardano’s interests while ensuring responsible governance and long-term treasury sustainability.
- The explorer provides exceptional value by unifying treasury tools, real-time analytics, and governance insights into a single, transparent platform, eliminating the need for multiple disparate systems. It delivers high-impact capabilities, including:
            - Real-time treasury inflow/outflow dashboards
            - Beneficiary transparency and ranking 
            - Long-term treasury sustainability forecasting 
            - Project accountability tracking with milestone monitoring 
            - Public governance intelligence supporting informed voter decisions 
            - Checks and balances between community and proposers milestone update
- Beyond technical functionality, the platform strengthens the entire Cardano ecosystem by:
        - Improving decision-making processes for voters and stakeholders
        - Reducing governance inefficiencies and opaque fund allocation
        - Enhancing oversight and transparency of funded projects
        - Supporting community engagement and participatory governance through accessible, auditable, and actionable data
- For a modest budget of 150,000 ADA, the project delivers high return on investment, ensuring that Cardano’s treasury is protected, optimized, and transparent, while laying the foundation for scalable, long-term ecosystem resilience.
